The **Gauntlets of Purity** are a set of [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") armor that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a pair of [gauntlets of power](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_power "Gauntlets of power") made of [silver](/wiki/Silver "Silver").

## Generation

The Gauntlets of Purity can only be created by combining [Dragonbane](/wiki/Dragonbane "Dragonbane") and [Grayswandir](/wiki/Grayswandir "Grayswandir") at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") - it cannot be [wished](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for, and will revert to its base item if left in a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") file.

## Description

While worn, in addition to the [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and 25 [strength](/wiki/Strength "Strength") conferred by its base item, the Gauntlets of Purity confer [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection"), [resistance to death magic](/wiki/Death_resistance "Death resistance"), and faster [energy](/wiki/Energy "Energy") regeneration, and do not confer any penalties to [spellcasting](/wiki/Spellcasting "Spellcasting"). Additionally, a lawful character wearing the Gauntlets of Purity is immune to [seduction](/wiki/Seduction "Seduction") and gains a bonus to [martial arts](/wiki/Martial_arts "Martial arts") damage when fighting unarmed.

To keep the Gauntlets of Purity worn, a character must remain piously aligned: if their [alignment record](/wiki/Alignment_record "Alignment record") drops below this threshold, the gauntlets will resist being worn, and will force themselves off the character's hands if they are already worn when this occurs. Blasting damage from the Gauntlets is also more severe for cross-aligned characters: the blasts inflict 6d10 damage if you have a stellar alignment record (above 50), and 8d10 damage otherwise. Additionally, the Gauntlets of Purity have a 1⁄2000 chance each turn to slip off the hands of a chaotic character wearing them, and [Infidels](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel") cannot wear the Gauntlets at all.

## Encyclopedia entry

Only the most pure of heart can wear these gauntlets. Those  
that wear them can resist the charms and wiles of even the  
most seductive of creatures that would seek to corrupt their  
hearts.
